00073   double Atom::charge(void) const {
00074     if (!(mask & chargebit))
00075       throw(UnsetProperty("Atom has no charge set"));
00076     return(_charge);
00077   }

00093   void Atom::clearBonds(void) { bonds.clear(); clearPropertyBit(bondsbit); }
00095   void Atom::addBond(const pAtom& p) { bonds.push_back(p->id()); setPropertyBit(bondsbit); }
00097   void Atom::addBond(const int i) { bonds.push_back(i); setPropertyBit(bondsbit); }
00098 
00100   void Atom::deleteBond(const int b) {
00101     std::vector<int>::iterator i = find(bonds.begin(), bonds.end(), b);
00102     if (i == bonds.end())
00103       throw(std::runtime_error("Attempting to delete a non-existent bond"));
00104     bonds.erase(i);
00105     if (bonds.size() == 0)
00106       clearPropertyBit(bondsbit);
00107   }
00108 
00110   void Atom::deleteBond(const pAtom& p) { deleteBond(p->id()); }
00111 
00113   std::vector<int> Atom::getBonds(void) const {
00114     if (!(mask & bondsbit))
00115       throw(UnsetProperty("Atom has no connectivity"));
00116     return(bonds);
00117   }
00118 
00119   void Atom::setBonds(const std::vector<int>& list) {
00120     bonds = list;
00121     setPropertyBit(bondsbit);
00122   }
00123 
00124   bool Atom::hasBonds(void) const { return(bonds.size() != 0); }
00125 
00127   bool Atom::isBoundTo(const int i) {
00128     std::vector<int>::iterator found = find(bonds.begin(), bonds.end(), i);
00129     return(found != bonds.end());
00130   }
00131 
00132   bool Atom::isBoundTo(const pAtom& p) { return(isBoundTo(p->id())); }

00147   bool Atom::checkProperty(const bits bitmask) { return((mask & bitmask) != 0); }
00148 
00149 
00150   void Atom::checkUserBits(const bits bitmask) {
00151     if (! bitmask & (flagbit|usr1bit|usr2bit|usr3bit) )
00152       throw(std::logic_error("Attempting to set a non-user property bit in an Atom"));
00153   }
00154 
00155   void Atom::setProperty(const bits bitmask) {
00156     checkUserBits(bitmask);
00157     setPropertyBit(bitmask);
00158   }
00159 
00160   void Atom::clearProperty(const bits bitmask) {
00161     checkUserBits(bitmask);
00162     clearPropertyBit(bitmask);
00163   }

00166   void Atom::init() {
00167     _id = 1;
00168     _resid = 1;
00169     _atomic_number = -1;
00170     _b = _q = 0.0;
00171     _charge = 0.0;
00172     _mass = 1.0;
00173     _name = "    ";
00174     _altloc = " ";
00175     _resname = "   ";
00176     _chainid = " ";
00177     _segid = "    ";
00178     _pdbelement = "";
00179     _record = "ATOM";
00180     mask = nullbit;   // Nullbit means nothing was set...
00181   }
00182 
00183   void Atom::setPropertyBit(const bits bitmask) { mask |= bitmask; }
00185   void Atom::clearPropertyBit(const bits bitmask) { mask &= (~bitmask); }

00188   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const loos::Atom& a) {
00189     os << "<ATOM ID='" << a._id << "' NAME='" << a._name << "' ";
00190     os << "RESID='" << a._resid << "' RESNAME='" << a._resname << "' ";
00191     os << "COORDS='" << a._coords << "' ";
00192     os << "ALTLOC='" << a._altloc << "' CHAINID='" << a._chainid << "' ICODE='" << a._icode << "' SEGID='" << a._segid << "' ";
00193     os << "B='" << a._b << "' Q='" << a._q << "' CHARGE='" << a._charge << "' MASS='" << a._mass << "'";
00194     os << " ATOMICNUMBER='" << a._atomic_number <<"'";
00195     //    os << " MASK='" << boost::format("%x") % a.mask << "'";
00196     if (a.hasBonds() > 0) {
00197       std::vector<int>::const_iterator i;
00198       os << ">\n";
00199       for (i=a.bonds.begin(); i != a.bonds.end(); i++)
00200         os << "  <BOND>" << *i << "</BOND>\n";
00201       os << "</ATOM>";
00202     } else
00203       os << "/>";
00204     return(os);
00205   }

00208   bool AtomEquals::operator()(const pAtom& a, const pAtom& b) const {
00209     return(a->name() == b->name()
00210            && a->id() == b->id()
00211            && a->resname() == b->resname()
00212            && a->resid() == b->resid()
00213            && a->segid() == b->segid());
00214   }
00215 
00216   bool AtomCoordsEquals::operator()(const pAtom& a, const pAtom& b) const {
00217     bool bb = (a->name() == b->name()
00218                && a->id() == b->id()
00219                && a->resname() == b->resname()
00220                && a->resid() == b->resid()
00221                && a->segid() == b->segid());
00222     if (!bb)
00223       return(false);
00224 
00225     double d = a->coords().distance2(b->coords());
00226     return( d <= threshold );
00227   }
